definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: During exploiting heavy oil in steam huff-puff production wells, Electric cables are usually used to heat produced liquid.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽吞吐井採出稠油時，經常利用電纜加熱。

sentences.english: Part of the overhead stream is withdrawn as distillate, or overhead product.
sentences.chinese: 頂部液體的一部分作爲餾出物或者說是塔頂產品採出。

sentences.english: The reinjection of gas back into a retrograde gas reservoir as it is produced.
sentences.chinese: 採出的天然氣被回注入反凝析氣藏。

sentences.english: The amount of arsenic discharged in the form of mining tailings accounted for about 70% of the total mined.
sentences.chinese: 在礦產採冶過程中，採出的砷有70%棄留於尾礦中。

sentences.english: Oil well produces associated gas more or less during production.
sentences.chinese: 油井在採油過程中，都採出或多或少的伴生氣。
